articles.author: Jonathan M. Gitlin
articles.title: “Ban Chinese electric vehicles now,” demands US senator - Ars Technica
articles.description: China's EV industry benefits from billions of dollars in government subsidies.
articles.content: Enlarge/ BYD electric cars stand at a BYD dealership on April 05, 2024, in Berlin, Germany. BYD, which stands for Build Your Dreams, is a Chinese manufacturer that went from making solar panels to el… [+4141 chars]
